Two people have been arrested over the death of a 71-year-old man who was assaulted in Newcastle.

Write a short summary for the following passage:
The man, who has not been named, was found with head injuries at an address in Stratford Grove West at about 15:00 GMT.
He died in hospital and Northumbria Police said the death was being treated as murder.
A 69-year-old woman and a 45-year-old man are being questioned.
Summary:
